headline.main: 5 FRENCH INCIDENTS MARK SILENCE PLEA; Work Stoppages and a Havre Assembly Police Dispersed Laid to de Gaulle Protest

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 1 -- No demonstrations or incidents of importance were reported in either zone of France yesterday as a consequence of General Charles de Gaulle's orders for a brief sit-down in memory of the executed hostages.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: OCCUPATION AND REHABILITATION OF CONQUERED AREAS

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
